displayName.english: I am One in a Million, and There Are Six Thousand People in the World Exactly Like Me

description.english: Awarded for racking up over 999,999.999 points total.

displayName.english: I Have Jumped Beyond the Powers of Two, and Have Lived to Tell the Tale
I Avoid Sleep Wherever Possible, So I Played AaaaaAAaaaAAAaaAAAAaAAAAA!!! a Whole Lot
I Have Broken More Glass Than a Finely Corpulent Opera Singer, and Love Myself For It
I am at Risk of Contracting Mononucleosis, Which is Known Colloquially as the Kissing Disease

description.english: This achievement is an award which is awarded for achieving 10,000 kisses total.

displayName.english: The Rhylos and Skaery Memorial Achievement, for Which We Will Honor Them

description.english: All fives. All five stars. On all levels. 81 levels. Yeah.

displayName.english: I Have Completed Every Single of the New Levels and Can Honestly Say That I am Awesome

description.english: Complete the 43 new levels in Awesome. You know, the lower levels? When you click on the down arrow from the level selection screen. Those levels.

displayName.english: One Fewer Than a Lewd Innuendo Because We Are Totally Past That Phase

description.english: Get exactly 68 kisses in one level. Not 67, unless you then get the 68th. 70 is right out.

displayName.english: OooooOOoooOOOooOOOOoOOOOO!!! -- O Ooooooooo Ooooooooo ooo Ooooooo

description.english: Geez. So, like, you're parachuting, and your velocity has decreased to the point where you're probably not going to die, right? So, what do you do? Have a sandwich? What if you held the O key down long enough? You could get this achievement. Or, you could say, "Oh, I don't want to do that." That is also okay. Also, Ichiro says that if you e-mail Owlchemy Labs customer support with the phrase "Alex is nude," it'd be a good way to mess with them. Pretty lousy thing for us to say, given that Owlchemy spent a lot of time working on this game, right? That's life. It's real. It's raw!

displayName.english: I Have Come to The Point in My Life Where I Appreciate Christmas Mall Music

description.english: Seriously. Christmas mall music eventually seeps into your brain, and you get all domestic, and you start looking at the children and going, "well, wouldn't it be nice to have kids of my own someday, so that I can play video games with them?" In the meantime, get 4 stars on all the levels in the freeeee Christmas Mall Music pack.
